description:
Ryo is hired as the bodyguard of a popular newscaster who is doing a story on the link between a major politician and the yakuza.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Vision Newscaster - Ryo`s Mokkori Scandal Report
Totsugeki Bijin Caster: Ryou no Maruhi Mokkori Shuzai
突撃美人キャスター 獠の秘(まるひ)モッコリ取材
